name: ORS CuSP Case Notes for a Date Range
description:
This report lists CuSP case notes entered for a date range.
Tab 1 shows young people currently in the selected establishment, with a CuSP case note, regardless of where it was entered.
Tab 2 shows those young people that had a CuSP case note enered at the selected establishment, regardless of where they are located now (includes those currently in the establishment, transferred and released)
DQ0028 - v00.00.03 Last Modified: 09/07/2020

dataset.name: Case Notes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_TIME, AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME, AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME AS CASE_NOTES_STAFF_FIRST_NAME, AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME AS CASE_NOTES_STAFF_LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID AS CASE_NOTE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_MEMBERS AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID = AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE (+) = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-01-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('01-02-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE = 'CUSP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, CONTACT_DATE, CONTACT_TIME, USERNAME, CASE_NOTES_STAFF_FIRST_NAME, CASE_NOTES_STAFF_LAST_NAME, CASE_NOTE_TEXT, CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AUDIT_TIMESTAMP, AGY_LOC_ID, CASE_NOTE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE, ALL_OFFENDERS.CASE_NOTE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE AS V_CNOTE_EST_CODE, CASE_NOTE_TYPE || ' - ' || V_CASE_NOTE_SUBTYPE_ALL AS V_CASE_NOTE_TYPE_SUBTYPE_ALL, CASE_NOTES_STAFF_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || CASE_NOTES_STAFF_LAST_NAME AS V_CONCAT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Case Notes Est
dataset.query: DP5_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS ESTABLISHMENT_ID, AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID AS CASE_NOTE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE (+) = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-01-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('01-02-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE = 'CUSP')), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_TIME, AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME, AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME AS CASE_NOTES_STAFF_FIRST_NAME, AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME AS CASE_NOTES_STAFF_LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP, AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID, DP5_.ESTABLISHMENT_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_MEMBERS AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, DP5_ WHERE ((AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID = AT_CASE_NOTES_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-01-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('01-02-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE = 'CUSP')) AND (DP5_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, CONTACT_DATE, CONTACT_TIME, USERNAME, CASE_NOTES_STAFF_FIRST_NAME, CASE_NOTES_STAFF_LAST_NAME, CASE_NOTE_TEXT, CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AUDIT_TIMESTAMP, AGY_LOC_ID, ESTABLISHMENT_ID AS V_EST_CODE, CASE_NOTE_TYPE || ' - ' || V_CASE_NOTE_SUBTYPE_ALL AS V_CASE_NOTE_TYPE_SUBTYPE_ALL, CASE_NOTES_STAFF_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || CASE_NOTES_STAFF_LAST_NAME AS V_CONCAT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Offenders
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID AS CASE_NOTE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_AGENCY_LOC.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE (+) = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-01-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('01-02-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE = 'CUSP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, CASE_NOTE_ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_CONCAT_NAME
field.legacySql: =[Case Notes Staff First Name] +" " + [Case Notes Staff Last Name]

field.name: $ref:V_CONCAT_NAME
field.legacySql: =[Case Notes Staff First Name] +" " + [Case Notes Staff Last Name]
